name: Dive! Link!
description:
Collect 3 seashells to complete the game.

  1. Reveal undersea by using the <inspect> action until you found a seashell.
  2. Swim until you are above the seashell.
  3. Use the <dive> action to collect the seashell.

Controls

  • Move: Z, Q, S, D / Q, S, W, D
  • Dive: Left mouse button
  • Reveal undersea: Right mouse button
